transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Hanji.
Customer: Haan sir, Garima Consultants Engineers kya se baat kar rahe hain na sir?
Executive: Bol raha hu.
Customer: Haan sir, main Manish bol raha tha sir aapka account manage kar India Mart head office pe.
Customer: Bolo bhaiya.
Executive: Haan sir, kal aapke sir se baat hui thi 012 wale number pe hai na sir? Ji ji.
Customer: Ji ji. Haan to unhone bola tha ki aapne naye unhone naya executive aapke yahan hire kiya hai jo India Mart dekh rahe hain. Aap hi dekh rahe hain na sir?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Haan to sir main aapko sir actually training deni thi sir. India Mart kaise use karna hai ke wo karna kaise use karna hai kaise by lead consume karni hai hai na sir puri training deni thi aapko.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Uske liye sir aap kab free hain? Abhi free rahenge ya kal morning mein rahenge sir aap time bata sakte hain mujhe?
Customer: Sir kal morning mein 11 baje kar le?
Executive: 12 baje sir?
Customer: 11 baje.
Executive: 11 baje. Theek hai theek hai to aapka main ek kaam karunga yahi number hai na aapka whatsapp ye jisse meri baat ho rahi hai 801. Ji ji.
Customer: Ji. Haan to main ek kaam karunga main aapko link share karunga sir whatsapp pe google meet ki theek hai?
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Haan to usme aapko main puri training aur puri guidance dunga sir kaise India Mart use karna hai kaise buyer se baat karni hai pura aapko samjha dunga theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Haan to waise abhi aap India Mart use kis mein karte hain phone mein use karte hain ya desktop mein use karte hain?
Customer: Desktop.
Executive: Achcha desktop mein karte hain theek hai to aap sir ek kaam karna aap desktop se join karna theek hai usme achcha samajh mein aayega aapko theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Haan to main kal aapko 11 baje ek bar aapko inform kar dunga ya call kar lunga to main aapko link share karunga aapke whatsapp number pe aap to usse join kar lena theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai. Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive needs to provide training about IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive scheduled a Google Meet for training.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share the meeting link on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- training, google meet, buyleads, desktop
